modules

Class JavafxPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.JavafxPrinter

  • public class JavafxPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    class for printing JavaFx screens, all prints start with 2 dialogs to select page properties and selecting printer
    Since:
    23/12/2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Or Man
    See Also:
    JavafxPrinter#printNode(Node, Window), printThisWindow(Window), printWinowOwnerOfNode(Node)
